channel.title: Mcp on Vectors & Verbs
channel.description: Recent content in Mcp on Vectors & Verbs

item.title: USB-C of AI Space: The Model Context Protocol
item.description: MCP is the open standard for connecting AI models to data and tools. Discover how Anthropic’s new protocol solves the $N imes M$ integration problem, creating a plug-and-play ecosystem for AI agents.

item.title: Electronic Executives: RAG, ReAct and MCP
item.description: A deep dive into the cognitive architectures of modern AI agents, exploring Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), the ReAct reasoning pattern, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP).
